description: MK Signature Lip Liner in a beautiful Dark Berry shade features a smooth, creamy, waterproof formula in a retractable pencil that never needs sharpening! It glides on easily with a clean, precise line that perfectly defines lips. And the color coding on the outside quickly identifies the shade inside.
